hymn.title: Vessel, I Am a Vessel
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: V- v- v- ves -- sel! I am a ves -- sel! I'm a v- v- v- ves -- sel ma- ma- ma- made by God! V- V- Ves -- sel of mer -- cy, Ch- ch- ch- ch- ch- cho -- sen, Use -- ful to the Mas -- ter, for good work pre -- pared. Ves -- sel, ves -- sel, made by God! Mer -- cy! Cho -- sen! Work pre -- pared!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2014 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: V-v-v-vessel! I am a vessel! I'm a v-v-v-vessel ma-ma-ma-made by God! V-V-Vessel of mercy, Ch-ch-ch-ch-ch-chosen, Useful to the Master, for good work prepared.
Vessel, vessel, Made by God! Mercy! Chosen! Work prepared!
